author: Dan Gallagher
title: Spotify Will Need To Shift Its Tune
text:
Spotify is at risk of becoming a one-hit wonder.
The music-streaming giant will be hard-pressed to justify its high valuation when its shares start trading, potentially as soon as March. Over the long term, it needs to leverage its big user base to diversify into profitable areas.

About 90% of Spotifyâ€™s revenue now comes from the 71 million...
